name: Avoid using 'System.err' and 'System.out' outside a try catch block
description: 'System.err' and 'System.out' should not be used outside a try catch block.
output: This report lists all Methods using 'System.err' and 'System.out' outside a try catch block. It provides the following information: Method full name

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling

qualityStandards.name: Catch of overly broad exception types
qualityStandards.description: Remove instances where a function, method, procedure, stored procedure, sub-routine, etc. contains a catch of an exception whose type is part of a list of overly broad exception types

qualityStandards.name: Declaration of Catch for Generic Exception
qualityStandards.description: Catching overly broad exceptions promotes complex error handling code that is more likely to contain security vulnerabilities.

qualityStandards.name: The application development team must follow a set of coding standards.
